   18: 
   19: -module(eturnal_SUITE).
   20: -compile(export_all).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -type info() :: ct_suite:ct_info().
   24: -type config() :: ct_suite:ct_config().
   25: -type test_def() :: ct_suite:ct_test_def().
   26: -type test_name() :: ct_suite:ct_testname().
   27: -type group_def() :: ct_suite:ct_group_def().
   28: -type group_name() :: ct_suite:ct_groupname().
   29: 
   30: %% API.
   31: 
   32: -spec suite() -> [info()].
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   35: 
   36: -spec init_per_suite(config()) -> config().
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     Config.
   39: 
   40: -spec end_per_suite(config()) -> ok.
   41: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: -spec init_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> config().
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: -spec end_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> ok.
   49: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: -ifdef(old_inet_backend).
   53: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   54: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   55:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-old-otp.yml", Config);
   56: init_per_testcase(stun_tcp_auto, _Config) ->
   57:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   58: init_per_testcase(stun_tls_auto, _Config) ->
   59:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   60: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: -else.
   63: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   64: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   65:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-new-otp.yml", Config);
   66: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   67:     Config.
   68: -endif.
   69: 
   70: -spec end_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> ok.
   71: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: -spec groups() -> [group_def()].
   75: groups() ->
   76:     [].
   77: 
   78: -spec all() -> [test_def()] | {skip, term()}.
   79: all() ->
   80:     [start_eturnal,
   81:      check_info,
   82:      check_sessions,
   83:      check_credentials,
   84:      check_loglevel,
   85:      check_version,
   86:      reload,
   87:      connect_tcp,
   88:      connect_tls,
   89:      turn_udp,
   90:      stun_udp,
   91:      stun_tcp,
   92:      stun_tls,
   93:      stun_tcp_auto,
   94:      stun_tls_auto,
   95:      stop_eturnal].
   96: 
   97: -spec start_eturnal(config()) -> any().
   98: start_eturnal(_Config) ->
   99:     ct:pal("Starting up eturnal"),
  100:     {ok, _} = application:ensure_all_started(eturnal).
  101: 
  102: -spec check_info(config()) -> any().
  103: check_info(_Config) ->
  104:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal statistics"),
  105:     {ok, Info} = eturnal_ctl:get_info(),
  106:     true = is_list(Info).
  107: 
  108: -spec check_sessions(config()) -> any().
  109: check_sessions(_Config) ->
  110:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions"),
  111:     {ok, Sessions} = eturnal_ctl:get_sessions(),
  112:     true = is_list(Sessions).
  113: 
  114: -spec check_credentials(config()) -> any().
  115: check_credentials(_Config) ->
  116:     Timestamp = "2009-10-30 11:00:00Z",
  117:     Username = 1256900400,
  118:     Password = "uEKlpcME7MNMMVRV8rUFPCTIFEs=",
  119:     ct:pal("Checking credentials valid until ~s", [Timestamp]),
  120:     {ok, Credentials} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Timestamp, []),
  121:     {ok, [Username, Password], []} =
  122:         io_lib:fread("Username: ~u~~nPassword: ~s", Credentials),
  123:     lists:foreach(
  124:       fun(Lifetime) ->
  125:               ct:pal("Checking credentials valid for ~s", [Lifetime]),
  126:               {ok, Creds} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Lifetime, "alice"),
  127:               {ok, [Time, Pass], []} =
  128:                   io_lib:fread("Username: ~u:alice~~nPassword: ~s", Creds),
  129:               {ok, Pass} =
  130:                   eturnal_ctl:get_password(integer_to_list(Time) ++ ":alice"),
  131:               true = erlang:system_time(second) + 86400 - Time < 5
  132:       end, ["86400", "86400s", "1440m", "24h", "1d"]).
  133: 
  134: -spec check_loglevel(config()) -> any().
  135: check_loglevel(_Config) ->
  136:     Level = "debug",
  137:     ct:pal("Setting log level to ~s", [Level]),
  138:     ok = eturnal_ctl:set_loglevel(list_to_atom(Level)),
  139:     ct:pal("Checking whether log level is set to ~s", [Level]),
  140:     {ok, Level} = eturnal_ctl:get_loglevel().
  141: 
  142: -spec check_version(config()) -> any().
  143: check_version(_Config) ->
  144:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal version"),
  145:     {ok, Version} = eturnal_ctl:get_version(),
  146:     match = re:run(Version, "^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9](\\+[0-9]+)?",
  147:                    [{capture, none}]).
  148: 
  149: -spec reload(config()) -> any().
  150: reload(_Config) ->
  151:     ct:pal("Reloading eturnal"),
  152:     ok = eturnal_ctl:reload().
  153: 
  154: -spec connect_tcp(config()) -> any().
  155: connect_tcp(_Config) ->
  156:     Port = 34780,
  157:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  158:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  159:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  160:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  161: 
  162: -spec connect_tls(config()) -> any().
  163: connect_tls(_Config) ->
  164:     Port = 53490,
  165:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  166:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  167:     {ok, TCPSock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  168:     {ok, TLSSock} = fast_tls:tcp_to_tls(TCPSock, [connect]),
  169:     ok = fast_tls:close(TLSSock).
  170: 
  171: -spec turn_udp(config()) -> any().
  172: turn_udp(_Config) ->
  173:     Port = 34780,
  174:     Username = <<"2145913200">>,
  175:     Password = <<"cLwpKS2/9bWHf+agUImD47PIXNE=">>,
  176:     Realm = <<"eturnal.net">>,
  177:     ct:pal("Allocating TURN relay on 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  178:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  179:     ok = stun_test:allocate_udp(Addr, Port, Username, Realm, Password).
  180: 
  181: -spec stun_udp(config()) -> any().
  182: stun_udp(_Config) ->
  183:     Port = 34780,
  184:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  185:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  186:     Result = stun_test:bind_udp(Addr, Port),
  187:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  188:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  189: 
  190: -spec stun_tcp(config()) -> any().
  191: stun_tcp(_Config) ->
  192:     Port = 34780,
  193:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  194:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  195:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  196:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  197:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  198: 
  199: -spec stun_tls(config()) -> any().
  200: stun_tls(_Config) ->
  201:     Port = 53490,
  202:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  203:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  204:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  205:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  206:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  207: 
  208: -spec stun_tcp_auto(config()) -> any().
  209: stun_tcp_auto(_Config) ->
  210:     Port = 34781,
  211:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  212:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  213:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  214:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  215:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  216: 
  217: -spec stun_tls_auto(config()) -> any().
  218: stun_tls_auto(_Config) ->
  219:     Port = 34781,
  220:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  221:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  222:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  223:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  224:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  225: 
  226: -spec stop_eturnal(config()) -> any().
  227: stop_eturnal(_Config) ->
  228:     ct:pal("Stopping eturnal"),
  229:     ok = application:stop(eturnal).
  230: 
  231: %% Internal functions.
  232: 
  233: -spec set_eturnal_env(file:filename_all(), config()) -> config().
  234: set_eturnal_env(ConfName, Config) ->
  235:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  236:     ConfFile = filename:join(DataDir, ConfName),
  237:     ok = application:set_env(conf, file, ConfFile),
  238:     ok = application:set_env(conf, on_fail, stop),
  239:     ok = application:set_env(eturnal, on_fail, exit),
  240:     Config.
